tests.title: Verify user can drag and drop
tests.fullTitle: Droppable Validation Verify user can drag and drop

err.message: AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: expected '<div#droppable.drop-box.ui-droppable.ui-droppable-hover>' to have text 'Dropped!', but the text was 'Drop here'
